#include<stdio.h>

int digit_sum(int n){
    int num = n; long sum=0;
    while(n){
        sum += n%10;
        n/=10;
    }
    return (sum+num);
}

int main(){
    int t; scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int n; scanf("%d",&n);
        int i;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
            if(digit_sum(i)==n)
                break;
        }
        if(i==n+1)
            printf("NONE\n");
        else
            printf("%d\n",i);
    }
    return 0;
}
